snippet.title: Hellmut: The Badass from Hell - The Sounds of Hell
snippet.description:
Making the sound effects can be very creative process. This applies to Badass especially as the game is not exactly the realistic one...

Our sound engineers need to use a lot of imagination when creating sounds - check it out! And beware - there is a lot of violence on the vegetable!

Steam gamepage:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/705620/Hellmut_The_Badass_from_Hell/
GOG gamepage:
